long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introduction
Get ready to test your knife throwing skills in Knife Hit 2! This addictive and challenging game will put your precision and timing to the test as you aim to hit the target with your knives. Prepare yourself for a thrilling knife throwing adventure!

Gameplay
Knife Hit 2 offers a simple yet addictive gameplay experience that requires accuracy and focus. Here's how to play:

Aim for the target: Each level in Knife Hit 2 presents a rotating target with a variety of objects placed on it. Your goal is to throw knives at the target and hit the objects without hitting any of the existing knives. Take aim and tap the screen to throw a knife.
Timing is crucial: The target rotates at different speeds and directions, so timing is essential. Wait for the right moment to throw your knife and aim for the empty spaces between the existing knives to avoid collision.
Collect apples: As you hit the objects on the target, you'll earn apples. Collect as many apples as you can to unlock new knives and other rewards.
Unlock new levels: Progress through the levels by successfully hitting the objects on the target. Each level presents a new challenge with different patterns and obstacles. Show off your skills and unlock exciting new levels!
Beware of hazards: As you advance through the game, you may encounter additional hazards such as moving targets or objects that require multiple hits to be destroyed. Stay focused and adapt to these challenges to maintain your accuracy.
Use power-ups wisely: Knife Hit 2 offers power-ups that can help you in your knife throwing endeavors. These power-ups may include additional knives, temporary slow-motion, or increased accuracy. Use them strategically to maximize your chances of success.
Challenge yourself: Knife Hit 2 is all about improving your skills and achieving high scores. Challenge yourself to hit more objects, avoid collisions, and beat your previous records. Aim for perfection and become a master of knife throwing!
With its intuitive controls, addictive gameplay, and challenging levels, Knife Hit 2 offers an exciting and satisfying knife throwing experience. Get ready to test your aim, improve your accuracy, and hit the bullseye!
